name: The Haunted House
description:
You are in a haunted house, and you have no memory of how you got here.You are trying to gather information about your past, and most of all, escape from this god forsaken place. Try to find all the endings in the game!


PS. you will need to run this .rb (ruby file) in cmdor just search online on how to run a ruby file
Thx haha! And pls give me feed backs about the game!
